summary: Modifies shouts: Fire breath, ice breath and storm call, giving the player shouts more like the dragon.
descriptionHtml:
Dragon Voice

I am sure this has probably been done, however this is my rendition of shout editing to make it more immersive "in my opinion".

Modifies shouts: Fire breath, ice breath and storm call, giving the player shouts more like the dragon.

Fire breath; First word Unchanged due to the Parthurnax first encounter, Parthurnax attacks if the first word is edited, word 2 is exchanged for dragon fire 3, word 3 is exchanged for dragon fire 5, time outs unchanged.

Frost breath: Word 1 exchanged for dragon frost breath 1, word 2 for dragon frost breath 2 and word 3 for dragon frost breath 3, time outs unchanged.

Storm call: First and second words unchanged, word 3 exchanged for dragon storm call, time outs unchanged.

No scripts or animations changed or edited. Simple edit using vanilla resources, strength of shouts unedited. No other mods needed, suggest a new game as i have only tested it on a new game, will obviously conflict with anything that modifies the same other than that, should not conflict with anything else.
author: Gooberish1
